Package com.team1.Auber

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.team1.Auber.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerDemo
    public class Player
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    The player sprite. Extends the Actor class. Handles key presses for play moment, as wll as drawing the player each frame. The key press are polled rather than using events so that the player can move diagonally.

      • Player

        public Player​(MapRenderer map,
              int x,
              int y,
              java.lang.Integer difficulty,
              java.lang.Float savedSpeed,
              java.lang.Integer savedAttackDamage,
              java.lang.Boolean specialAttackEnabled)
        Create the player when resuming from save, to keep powerups
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        x - the starting X coordinate
        y - the starting Y coordinate
        difficulty - the difficulty of the game
        savedSpeed - Auber's movement speed
        savedAttackDamage - the damage Auber does with a hit
        specialAttackEnabled - whether or not Auber has access to the special attack
